question:
The text is for no 3 - 5    I have a little sister. Her name is Salsa She is only a year old. She is cute. Salsa like a boy
because her hair is very short. She can walk but she can't speak. She likes walking around
the house
Salsa likes to play ball. Mother gave her a ball yesterday. The ball is soft Salsa likes to kick
the ball I love my sister very much. She has the best smile in the world
3. Who is Salsa
a. The writer's baby
b. The writer's little brother
c. The writer's little sister
d. The writer's little boy ​

related_questions.question:
To: Zayn    Be ready for the next
competition
I put my book in your locker.
It may be very useful for you.
Do your best.
Practice makes perfect.
I wish you all the best
Keika​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Untuk: Zayn Bersiaplah untuk kompetisi berikutnya Saya menaruh buku saya di loker Anda. Ini mungkin sangat berguna untuk Anda. Lakukan yang terbaik. Latihan membuat sempurna. Aku doakan yang terbaik untukmu Keika

itu artinya

related_questions.question:
Buatlah kalimat berikut present perfect tensse

1. She (meet) him.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

She has met him

Penjelasan:

Present perfect tense dipakai untuk menyatakan perbuatan atau situasi yang dimulai di masa lampau dan sudah selesai atau masih terjadi atau masih ada hubungannya dengan masa sekarang. Contoh : I have been a teacher since two years ago. Diana has done her homework.

Jawaban:

she has met him

Penjelasan:

s+have/has+v3, sorry if I'm wrong :)

related_questions.question:
2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together    FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm
CLAIR Thanks. Dad
I'm afraid you can't
C. Yes, you can
I'm sorry, I need the car
D. No, thanks​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

2. CLAIR: Dad, can I borrow your car? i need to go to Alan's house to do our homework together

FATHER Please make sure that you get home before 8 pm

CLAIR Thanks. Dad

I'm afraid you can't

C. Yes, you can

I'm sorry, I need the car

D. No, thanks​

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan ditentukan dari reaksi Clair yang berterima kasih pada ayahnya, maka jawabannya adalah poin C. Yes, you can. Pilihan lain semuanya salah.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
18. Wulan     : What is your plan tonight?
Arbi
: I will watch a movie at home
Wulan : What movie are you going to watch?
Arbi : I don't know yet. Perhaps I will watch drama movie.
Wulan : You should watch education movie. It's good to add our knowledge.
Arbi : It sounds good to me.
The underline sentence in the dialogue above shows the expression of....
a. asking for plan
d. giving advice
b. asking for help
e. giving information
C. asking for advice
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. Asking for plan.

Penjelasan:

Ini jawabannnya ya.

Terima Kasih.

klo salah maap ya :)

Kenapa makan daging babi haram klo ayam tidak? ​

CAUTION    LIVE, CHILDREN PLAYING

 What does the above caution mean?
A.	Children are playing games around the place.
B.	Children are not allowed to play around the area.
C.	It is the place for children to play around here.
D.	You have to be careful because children are playing there.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. You have to be careful because children are playing there.

Semoga benar dan menjadi jawaban terbaik ya :)

related_questions.question:
7. AGA : Vino, can you help me fix my computer?    VINO: I'd love to, but today my schedule is full. What about tomorrow?
From the conversation, we know that ...
A. Vino cannot help Aga.
C. Vino refuses to help Aga.
B. Vino will fix Aga's computer today D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Jawabannya adalah D. Vino will fix Aga's computer tomorrow

Jawaban:

D. Vino will fix Aga's coputer tomorrow

Thanyou <3
